1.「おいっ！ ルッチー！| いるんだろう！？: Hey! Lucchie! I know you're in there!

2.「……ルッチー。| やはり ここにいたのか。| 送った手紙は 読んだか？: ...Lucchie. So you're here after all. Did you|read the letter I sent you?

3.「……ちーす。| 手紙 ありがとよ～。| 紙ヒコーキにして 楽しく遊んどいたぜ。: ...Cheers. Thanks for the letter. I made it|into a paper airplane and had fun playing with|it.

4.「ペアレンツで そろって来るなんて| 賢者って 案外 ヒマなんだなあ？: I'm surprised all the parents came... Sages|must have more free time than you think, don't|they?

5.「ルッチー！| 私たちは お前のためを思って……。: Lucchie! We're doing this for your own good...

6.「何度も 言っているだろう。| 遊び人などという くだらん職業は| さっさと や: I have told you many times. I have told you|many times to stop being a gadabout.

7.「いいか…… 遊び人など なんの役にも立たん。| くさった死体にたかる ハエのよ: You see... gadabouts are nothing. They are|like flies on a Walking Corpse. Such a futile|occupation will do you no good!

8.「……イマドキの遊び人は アンタたちが思ってる| ダセェ職業じゃねえ。もっと お: Trendy Gadabouts aren't what you think they|are. It's much more interesting. Don't judge|me.

9.「ルッチー あなたも いい大人でしょう。| 遊びだなんて ふざけたようなこと言っ: Lucchie, you are an adult. Don't be silly|about playing around, and look at the reality.

10.「これ以上 言っても ムダのようだな。: It seems there's no point in saying any more.

11.「……だが 今は 楽しかろうとも| じきに 遊び人の無力さに気づくだろう。| そ:
...But whatever fun you're having now, you|will soon realize the helplessness of|gadabouts. And when that time comes, you will|
|regret it at best.

13.「やべぇ～。あの人たちが ウワサの| ルッチーさんの ペアレンツですかぁ。| マ: Oh my gosh~! Are those the parents of the|rumored Mr. Lucchie? That's really scary...

14.「……ハイハイ！ そんなことは置いといて！| これからやる遊びの 内容を発表しち: ...Hi-hi! Let's put all that aside! I'll tell|you what we're going to do!

15.「今回は前から あたためてた とびきりの企画！| その名も……ハニーパーティー！: This time, I've been planning something I've|been saving up for a long time. It's called...|Honey Party!

16.「オォーーーッ！ マイ・ハニィーッ！！| オレの あまいキッスをォ あげるゥーッ: Oooooh! My honey! I give you my sweet kisses!

17.「プクランド大陸の エピステーサ丘陵って場所に| ハニーレイクっていう ハチミツ: In a place called Epistesa Hills in Pukuland|Continent, there is a lake made of honey|called Honey Lake...

18.「ハニーレイクを 熱で沸かして温泉にすんのさ！| さらにぃ～ そのハチミツ風呂に:
We'll heat Honey Lake and turn it into a hot|spring! And what's more, we'll use the honey|to make pancakes while bathing in the honey|
|bath!

19.「ほよよ～ なんか たのぴよそ～♪| ハチミツ三昧で あまあまだね～！: Oh, yes~, what fun~, all that honey, and it's|still so sweet~!

20.「だがな～ この遊びの準備は あまくねーぞ。| 湖をあっためる <%sEV_QU: But, prepare for a good time. Psyche Up the|lake <%sEV_QUE_NAME4> and some good pancakes!

21.「<%sEV_QUE_NAME4>なら バザーとかで| たくさん 売ってるっすよ: I'm sure there are lots of <%sev_que_name4>|for sale at Bazaars and such! Is|<%nev_que_t_num4> per person enough?

22.「ケーキといえば～ オルフェアの町に| おいしいと評判のケーキ屋さんが あったな:
Speaking of cakes~ I remember a cake shop in|the Town of Orphea that had a reputation for|delicious cakes. Their pancakes look delicious|
|too...

23.「なるなる～。んじゃ それらを各自で集めてきて| ３つあるうちの 真ん中のハニー: I'm sure. I guess we will collect them|ourselves and meet at Honey Lake, the middle|of the three.

24.「それと 服のままで温泉に入るわけにいかねーし| 水着着用で シクヨロ！ どの水:
And since we can't go to the hot springs in|our clothes, we'll be wearing swimsuits,|please! You can wear any swimsuit you want,|
|but you must be able to swim!

25.「じゃ みんな～ <%nEV_QUE_T_NUM4>個の<%sEV_QUE_NA:
Okay, everyone, grab your <%nev_que_t_num4>|and your <%sev_que_name4> and some good|pancakes and meet me at Honey Lake in the|
|middle of the Epistesa Hills in your bathing|suits. Meet us there!

26.「イエーイ <pc>っち！| 準備 カンペキみたいだなぁ～！| さっすが～！ 水: Yay <pc>! You look like you're ready|to go! I'm impressed! You look Squid in your|swimsuit!

29.ホカホカストーンで 湖があたたまっていく……。|ハニーレイクは ハチミツ温泉にな: Warmaline heats up the lake... and Honey Lake|becomes a honey hot spring!

30.<pc>たちは パンケーキを持ちよって|ハニーパーティーを始めた！: <pc> brought pancakes and started a|Honey Party!

31.「ごくらく ごくらくぅ～！| いい湯かげんだぜ～。| 前から やってみたかったん: Gokuraku, Gokuraku~! I've been wanting to try|this for a long time~! I've always wanted to|try this~ this game~!

32.「ほよよ～ ホント サイコー♪| とろけて ハチミツになっちゃいそ～<heart: Hoyoyo~ It's really the best♪ It's melting|and turning into honey~<heart>

33.「クゥ～ やっべぇ～！| アクロバット・パンケーキ うめぇ～っす！| ハチミツと: Yum! Acrobat pancakes are delicious! The honey|goes perfectly with the pancakes!

34.「オォーーーッ！ フィーバーッ！！| オレに 触れると ヤケドするぜィッ！！: Oooooh! Fever! Touch me and you'll get burned!

35.「ハハッ 何いってんだ パイセン。| 熱いのはパイセンじゃなくて ハチミツだろ…: What are you talking about, Plug? It's not|Paisen that's hot, it's honey...

38.「あ～っ！！| ホカホカストーンが たくさん増えてる～！| こんなに入れた覚えな: Oh, my gosh! There are so many Warmalines! I|don't remember putting this much in...why~?

40.「誰だ！！| イタズラしやがったのはっ！？: Who did this! Who did this to you?

42.「ミヤビっちが言ってた……| ピエロとバニーの ふたり組……！: Miyabi said... a clown and a bunny, two|groups...!

43.「うふっ アツアツのおフロ よかったでしょ～<heart>| やっぱりぃ～ 遊び: Heh. A hot bath was great wasn't it~<heart>I knew|it~ A gadabout's life should be a fun|experience<heart>

44.「そや そや！ 言うたれ！| 近頃のヤングの 遊びときたらなァ！| ごっつ なま: Yes, yes! Tell them! You know what young|people are doing nowadays? It's so lame, it's|boring!

45.「そないな ツマラン遊びで 喜びよってからに| 遊び人のカザカミにも 置けへんわ:
I'm not even a gadabout, Kazakami, if you|think I'm going to be pleased by such a silly|game! Hey! You gadabouts should stop being|
|gadabouts!

46.「あ～？ なんだと てめーら？| ルッチーさんの考える 遊びはな～| やっべぇ～: Oh? What the hell do you think you're doing?|Mr. Lucchie's idea of fun is... it's really,|really fun!

47.「アヒャヒャ～！ そないな自信あるんやったら| ワイらが出す 遊び人の試練を受け: Ahhhhh! If you're so confident, take the|gadabout trial we'll give you! If you pass,|you'll be recognized as a true gadabout!

48.「だ～が 逃げたり 失敗するようなら……| ワレ 遊び人を名乗るのを やめろや！: But if you keep running away and failing you|can stop calling yourself a gadabout! And get|back to work! Hey!

49.「遊び人を……やめさせようってのか……？: Are you trying to... stop gadabout...?

50.「やっぱり アンタたちが 労魔デスワーク……: I knew you guys were Labor Demon Deathwork...

51.「……オイ ワレ！| 今日のところは 時間切れや！: Hey, hey, hey, hey! Time's up for today!

53.「ジブンら！ 遊び人を続けたいなら| ワイらの試練を おとなしく受けることやな！: Givens! If you want to continue playing|gadabout, you'll have to submit yourselves to|our trials in a docile manner! See you later!

56.「……果たし状だ。| 試練の内容が 書いてあるみてーだな。: It's a letter of fulfillment. It looks like it|describes the trials.

57.「ええ～？ ルッチーさん| ガチで アイツらが言ってた試練| 受けるつもりっすか: What? Are you really going to take the trials|they were talking about, Mr. Lucchie?

58.「……まあな。| アイツら 労魔デスワークにちがいねえ。| バケの皮を はいでや: Well, yeah. They must be Labor Demon|Deathwork. We're going to have to skin them.

59.「いや～ とんだ ジャマ者が入っちまって| ごめんな～ <pc>っち。| とりま: Sorry for the inconvenience, <pc>.|Let's get you back to the Gadabode for now!

60.「さっそく ハニーパーティーと| シャレこみますか！: Let's get to it and have a Honey Party!
